checks.name: init_validation
checks.jq: select(.type == "system" and .subtype == "init") | .plugins[]?.name == "patent-kit" and (.skills? | any(. == "patent-kit:constitution")) and any(.mcp_servers[]?; (.name | test("google-patent-cli")) and .status == "connected") and any(.mcp_servers[]?; (.name | test("arxiv-cli")) and .status == "connected")

checks.name: constitution_loaded
checks.jq: .message.content[]? | select(.type == "text" and (.text | contains("Purpose") or contains("When to Load")))
